platipy.name: platipy
platipy.label: Platipy
platipy.description: PlatiPy is a library of tools for image processing and analysis designed specifically for medical imaging. This specific model focuses on the hybrid segmentation of cardiac substructures.
references: Finnegan, RN, Chin, V, Chlap, P, et al. Open-source, fully-automated hybrid cardiac substructure segmentation: development and optimisation. Phys Eng Sci Med. 2023

inputs.name: input1
inputs.description: Single DICOM CT Series of the patient

casust.name: casust
casust.label: CaSuSt
casust.description: CaSuSt is a pipeline for the segmentation of the heart and cardiac substructures from non-contrast CT scans.
references: Nürnberg, L, Bontempi, D, De Ruysscher, D, et al. Deep learning segmentation of heart substructures in radiotherapy treatment planning. Physica Medica: European journal of medical physics, 2022

inputs.name: input1
inputs.description: Single DICOM CT Series of the patient
